nodes.text: An Human male individual served as a member of the Senate Guard in 37 BBY. When Baroness Omnino of the planet Vena came to Coruscant on a diplomatic visit, she used a mind control device on the Senate Guard as part of a scheme to discredit the Jedi Order and eat some Mantellian Savrips. The Senate Guard shot and killed Omnino's bodyguard and was then chased by Jedi Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi. He fell to his own death.
